short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes a Gatsby development project with a keystroke.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to reload the Gatsby content model with a single keystroke. When developing your Gatsby website, this improves the Developer Experience massively, because you don't have to restart the Gatsby process anymore.
